attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fortnightly rubbish collection encourages Vermin, Maggots, Flies,is unhygenic, Pleasant Summer days are spoilt by the stench of rotting food,& Flies,  surely if you double bag the food with Plastic bags as suggested you are only adding to the problem of enviromental waste, plastic bags do not decompose,using twice as many to try & stop the stench & Maggots is counter productive.Any food bagged or otherwise will rot if left for 2 weeks particularly in the heat of the Summer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
